019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.examples.login;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
026import java.beans.ConstructorProperties;
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.io.StringWriter;
029import java.security.Principal;
030import java.util.HashSet;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.Optional;
033import java.util.Set;
034import java.util.concurrent.Future;
035import javax.management.remote.JMXPrincipal;
036import javax.security.auth.Subject;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
038import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
039import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
041import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
042import org.jgrapes.http.events.DiscardSession;
043import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
044import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
045import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.CloseModalDialog;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsolePrepared;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.OpenModalDialog;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SimpleConsoleCommand;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
061
062/**
063 * A conlet for poll administration.
064 */
065public class LoginConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<LoginConlet.AccountModel> {
066
067    private static final String PENDING_CONSOLE_PREPARED
068        = "pendingCosolePrepared";
069
070    /**
071     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
072     * 
073     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
074     *            on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
075     *            sends the event to
076     */
077    public LoginConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
078        super(componentChannel);
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    protected String generateInstanceId(AddConletRequest event,
083            ConsoleSession session) {
084        return "Singleton";
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * Register conlet.
089     *
090     * @param event the event
091     * @param channel the channel
092     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
093     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name exception
094     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
095     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
096     */
097    @Handler
098    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleSession channel)
099            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
100            ParseException, IOException {
101        // Add conlet resources to page
102        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
103            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
104                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
105                    type(), "Login-functions.js"))
106                .setScriptType("module"))
107            .addCss(event.renderSupport(), WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
108                "Login-style.css"))
109            .addPageContent("headerIcons", Map.of("priority", "1000"))
110            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Content));
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * As a model has already been created in {@link #doUpdateConletState},
115     * the "new" model may already exist in the session.
116     */
117    @Override
118    protected Optional<AccountModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
119            ConsoleSession session, String conletId) throws Exception {
120        Optional<AccountModel> model
121            = stateFromSession(session.browserSession(), conletId);
122        if (model.isPresent()) {
123            return model;
124        }
125        return super.createNewState(event, session, conletId);
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    protected Optional<AccountModel> createStateRepresentation(
130            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
131            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId) throws IOException {
132        return Optional.of(new AccountModel(conletId));
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Handle web console page loaded.
137     *
138     * @param event the event
139     * @param channel the channel
140     * @throws IOException 
141     * @throws ParseException 
142     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
143     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
144     */
145    @Handler(priority = 1000)
146    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event, ConsoleSession channel)
147            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
148            ParseException, IOException {
149        // If we are logged in, proceed
150        if (channel.browserSession().containsKey(Subject.class)) {
151            return;
152        }
153
154        // Suspend handling and save event "in" channel.
155        event.suspendHandling();
156        channel.setAssociated(PENDING_CONSOLE_PREPARED, event);
157
158        // Create model and save in session.
159        String conletId = type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR + "Singleton";
160        AccountModel accountModel = new AccountModel(conletId);
161        accountModel.setDialogOpen(true);
162        putInSession(channel.browserSession(), conletId, accountModel);
163
164        // Render login dialog
165        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("Login-dialog.ftl.html");
166        var bundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
167        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
168            processTemplate(event, tpl,
169                fmSessionModel(channel.browserSession())))
170                    .addOption("title", bundle.getString("title"))
171                    .addOption("cancelable", false).addOption("okayLabel", "")
172                    .addOption("applyLabel", bundle.getString("Submit"))
173                    .addOption("useSubmit", true));
174    }
175
176    private Future<String> processTemplate(
177            Event<?> request, Template template,
178            Object dataModel) {
179        return request.processedBy().map(procBy -> procBy.executorService())
180            .orElse(Components.defaultExecutorService()).submit(() -> {
181                StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
182                try {
183                    template.process(dataModel, out);
184                } catch (TemplateException | IOException e) {
185                    throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
186                }
187                return out.toString();
188
189            });
190    }
191
192    @Override
193    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
194            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId,
195            AccountModel model) throws Exception {
196        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
197        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Content)) {
198            Template tpl
199                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("Login-status.ftl.html");
200            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
201                processTemplate(event, tpl,
202                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model)))
203                        .setRenderAs(RenderMode.Content));
204            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(), conletId,
205                "updateUser",
206                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.browserSession())
207                    .map(Principal::getName).orElse(null)));
208            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Content);
209        }
210        return renderedAs;
211    }
212
213    @Override
214    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
215            ConsoleSession channel, AccountModel model) throws Exception {
216        if ("loginData".equals(event.method())) {
217            model.setDialogOpen(false);
218            Subject user = new Subject();
219            user.getPrincipals()
220                .add(new JMXPrincipal(event.params().asString(0)));
221            channel.browserSession().put(Subject.class, user);
222            channel.respond(new CloseModalDialog(type(), event.conletId()));
223            channel.associated(PENDING_CONSOLE_PREPARED, ConsolePrepared.class)
224                .ifPresentOrElse(ConsolePrepared::resumeHandling,
225                    () -> channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload")));
226            return;
227        }
228        if ("logout".equals(event.method())) {
229            channel.respond(new DiscardSession(channel.browserSession(),
230                channel.webletChannel()));
231            channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload"));
232        }
233    }
234
235    @Override
236    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
237            String conletId) throws Exception {
238        return stateFromSession(channel.browserSession(),
239            type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR + "Singleton")
240                .map(model -> !model.isDialogOpen()).orElse(true);
241    }
242
243    /**
244     * Model with account info.
245     */
246    @SuppressWarnings({ "serial", "PMD.DataClass" })
247    public static class AccountModel extends ConletBaseModel {
248
249        private boolean dialogOpen;
250
251        /**
252         * Creates a new model with the given type and id.
253         * 
254         * @param conletId the web console component id
255         */
256        @ConstructorProperties({ "conletId" })
257        public AccountModel(String conletId) {
258            super(conletId);
259        }
260
261        /**
262         * Checks if is dialog open.
263         *
264         * @return true, if is dialog open
265         */
266        public boolean isDialogOpen() {
267            return dialogOpen;
268        }
269
270        /**
271         * Sets the dialog open.
272         *
273         * @param dialogOpen the new dialog open
274         */
275        public void setDialogOpen(boolean dialogOpen) {
276            this.dialogOpen = dialogOpen;
277        }
278
279    }
280
281}
